original_text: When the army is carried off, the king of the South will be filled with pride and will slaughter many thousands, yet he will not remain triumphant.
korean_text: 그가 큰 무리를 사로잡은 후에 그의 마음이 스스로 높아져서 수만 명을 엎드러뜨릴 것이나 그 세력은 더하지 못할 것이요

sentences.original_text: When the army is carried off
the king of the South will be filled with pride
yet he will not remain triumphant
